reviewText: It was wonderful and a beautiful reminder of the outstanding show we saw over the lake with the mountains as a backdrop.

This 4-DVD of Impression: Liu Sanjie by Zhang Yimou is marvelous.
Having attended a live performance in Yangshuo in 2009, I can attest that the DVD's are a faithful rendition of the actual performance.
One of Zhang Yimou's best!

It was incredible; with an effective use of the almost unreal natural scenery as a backdrop for the music and dance; almost all on rafts in the Li river.  This is a good record of a pretty amazing show.
